name: Communist Cavern Crusade
description:
The Reds have started an exploratory mission of vast caverns using jets?! Strap on your flight helmet and fly like the cave wind.

Click/Touch/Spacebar - Fly Up

I recreated an old Flash game in Godot to help me learn the engine.  It's a clone of the classic helicopter game. The Soviet iconography is not intended to be a political statement; I was just really into Command & Conquer as a kid.
